import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Login.css' function Login() { const initialStateErrors = { email:{required : false}, password:{require: false}, coustomError:null } const [errors , seterrors] = useState({...initialStateErrors}); const [loading , setloading]= useState(false) return (

Login Now

{errors.email.required? ( Email is required. ) : null }
{errors.password.required? ( Password is required. ): null }
{loading ? (

): null } {errors.coustomError? (

Custom Error Message!

):null}
Create new account ? Please Register
) } export default Login;
